segments.text: Can you help me find a pan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you looking for a small , medium , or large pan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this one look big enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's the right size , but it weighs too much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what do you think of the aluminum pan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's light enough , but the handle will get too hot after cooking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's the same pan , but it has a space-age , heat-resistant plastic handle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my family's going to love this one . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so happy that you found what you wanted . Do you want to use a credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Wait , wait . Does a lid come with this pan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry . Here's the lid . Yes , it comes with the pan .
segments.speaker: S2
